channel.title: How To Get A Server Running [Noobscape v3 TUT]
channel.description: Hi everyone, I made this 4 teh n00bs... :cool: KK har we go... First you need a place to put the files in. Make a folder on your desktop called "Runescape Classic Private Server" or whatever you want. I personally don't give a crap what you name it. Open it up, then go to [code]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,425255.htm[/code] and download Noobscape v3. **Thx Yong Min!!! LOL O_o** Download the zip file from the link at the bottom of the post. If you have XP (Which I [u][i][b]HATE[/b][/i][/u]) you are set. XP can open zip files. If you have Windows Vista Or 7 (7 FTW!! Random... XD) Go to [code]http://rarlab.com/download.htm[/code] and click the top link. This is winrar. Install it, then double click the zip file that you just downloaded. (Noobscape) Then Hold down Shift then click both folders. Drag them to your Runescape Classic Private Server folder or whatever you called it. Open your folder with the big name I just said, (LOL too lazy to say it again!) and open your "Server" folder, then click Run Server.bat. Wait for a window to come up that is not black. (I'm not being racist, i'm referring to CMD) A white window will come up. Click the tab that says settings. Fill in all that crap, and make sure to click Update All!!!!!! Then click Main again and click run server. Then click shutdown server, then click run server. Sometimes, it doesn't fully save you server name, so boot it twice. Minimize that, then go to your client folder click Run Client.bat, and login with whatever login you want. I don't really care. If you want other people to access it, I will make that Tutorial later. WOW. That was long... LOL Thanks people! ;D :D ;D :D PS: I Will Do A TUT on how to get it online soon.
